Wednesday, November 4, 2020

Introducing Verses

Authors
  • Name
    Wayne Dahlberg
    Twitter
    @waynedahlberg

The year 2020 has really thrown a wrench into all our lifestyles. Here at home, and around the world, the LDS Church has cancelled Sunday services due to the global COVID-19 pandemic. In addition to the great resources the Church has provided for home-centered learning, I wanted a convenient way to keep up with my daily reading of The Book of Mormon.

The Church's official app Gospel Library is a massive resource. It has everything you need for gospel study and lesson preparation. In my opinion, its sheer size makes it feel a bit heavy for daily scripture reading. I want to open my phone and start reading where I left off the day before. No footnotes, cross-references, chapter headings. Nothing but scripture verses — one at a time on screen.

I want to open my phone and start reading where I left off the day before.
